issue.title: [CI] Remove duplicated cron/nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are builds duplicated between the GHA cron jobs and crossbow nightlies.

comments.body:
